Template.TextPart:
Hi,

Congratulations!  {{requestedByName}} at {{requestedByCompany}} has read your email and would like to review your pitch.

{{requestedByCompany}} uses OneRoost (https://www.oneroost.com) to manage their inbox and facilitate vendor pitches, simplifying the sales process for both parties.  To submit your information to {{requestedByCompany}}, please begin the process here: https://www.oneroost.com/teams/{{oneroostTeamId}}.

A vendor submission takes less than 10 minutes and a OneRoost representative is available to answer any questions via the orange chat icon.

Good Luck,
The OneRoost Team
